style_property.title: Progress bar background
style_property.description: Change the background color for the goal progress bars

style_property.title: Progress bar color
style_property.description: Change the color of the goal progress bars

style_property.title: Streak graph member color
style_property.description: The color of the line representing member goals on the streak graph

style_property.title: Streak graph post color
style_property.description: The color of the line representing post goals on the streak graph

style_property.title: Streak graph thread color
style_property.description: The color of the line representing thread goals on the streak graph
